title: UWHVF
description: Open source dataset of more than 25 thousand Humphrey Visual Fields (HVF) from routine clinical care

pts.description: The total number of unique patients in this dataset

eyes.description: The total number of unique eyes in this dataset

hvfs.description: The total number of unique HVFs in this dataset

coords.description: Visual field coordinate information for the sequence data

data.description: Full dataset by patient as the object key

^[0-9]+$.description: All available data for a given patient

gender.description: M for male, F for Female

year.description: Year of first visual field captured

^R|L$.description: HVF data for the right eye (R) and left eye (L)

age.description: Floating point age at date of HVF

hvf.description: 2D representation of HVF with 100.0 as untested values

items.description: sensitivity as float value with 100.0 as untested

hvf_seq.description: HVF as a sequence using 'coords' layout

td.description: 2D representation of total deviation with 100.0 as untested values

items.description: sensitivity as float value with 100.0 as untested

td_seq.description: total deviation as a sequence using 'coords' layout
